docs.text: MkDocs GOV.UK Theme This is a theme for using MkDocs with GOV.UK style Requirements python v3.8 and above MkDocs Usage Copy the govuk_theme to your project root Set the [theme] configuration option in your mkdocs.yml config file. theme: name: null custom_dir: 'govuk_theme'
docs.title: MkDocs GOV.UK Theme

docs.text: This is a theme for using MkDocs with GOV.UK style
